welcome_message_body: Welcome to Xianyang, China! Settle in and get ready to explore the city's rich history, vibrant culture, and delicious cuisine. We hope you enjoy your time here and make unforgettable memories.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network after completing a short registration process.
